title: NBA free agency: Latest signings, news, buzz, live reports

title: NBA free agency grades: Jaren Jackson Jr.'s $240M extension and every major deal

title: Boulter and Kartal win on record-breaking day for British players
description: Katie Boulter and Sonay Kartal both produces impressive victories at either end of a record-breaking day for British players at Wimbledon.

title: The Fluminense history maker, 44, with his eyes on Peter Shilton
description: Fluminense goalkeeper Fabio has helped his side into the Club World Cup quarter-final as he eyes Peter Shilton's appearance world record.

title: Williams ruled out of Lions tour with injury as White called up
description: The British and Irish Lions have suffered a hammer blow after Tomos Williams was ruled out of the rest of their tour to Australia with the hamstring problem sustained against Western Force on Saturday.

title: Guardiola: Club World Cup could 'destroy' City's Premier League campaign
description: Pep Guardiola has admitted he does not know if Manchester City's next Premier League challenge will be "destroyed" by their Club World Cup campaign or not.

title: Dustin Poirier: First two rounds tell us how Jack Della Maddalena vs. Islam Makhachev goes
description: Dustin Poirier gave insight on Islam Makhachev's UFC welterweight debut.

title: Former Wisconsin basketball star agrees to one-year deal with Phoenix Suns
